scripts.package:windows: (if not exist package/windows mkdir package\windows) && find package/windows -mindepth 1 -delete && electron-packager . TomoWallet --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=package/windows
scripts.package:mac: (if not exist package/macOS mkdir package\macOS) && find package/macOS -mindepth 1 -delete && electron-packager . TomoWallet --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --prune=true --asar --osx-sign=true --out=package/macOS
